trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state of the service.

The ServiceControllerStatus enumeration is used by an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to indicate whether an existing service is running, stopped, paused, or whether a Start, Stop, Pause, or Continue command is pending.
trans-unit.target: A ServiceControllerStatus számbavétel egy példányát használja a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>osztály annak jelzésére, hogy egy meglévő szolgáltatás fut, leállítva, szüneteltetve van, vagy hogy indítási, leállítása, szüneteltetése vagy Continue parancsot függőben.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" name="SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000005.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" name="SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000005 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_PAUSED" name="SERVICE_PAUSED" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000007.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_PAUSED" name="SERVICE_PAUSED" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000007 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" name="SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000006.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" name="SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000006 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_RUNNING" name="SERVICE_RUNNING" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000004.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_RUNNING" name="SERVICE_RUNNING" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000004 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_START_PENDING" name="SERVICE_START_PENDING" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000002.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_START_PENDING" name="SERVICE_START_PENDING" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000002 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_STOPPED" name="SERVICE_STOPPED" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000001.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_STOPPED" name="SERVICE_STOPPED" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000001 típusúként van definiálva.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" name="SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" href=""></xref> constant, which is defined as 0x00000003.
trans-unit.target: Ez megfelel a Win32 <xref uid="langword_csharp_SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" name="SERVICE_STOP_PENDING" href=""> </xref> konstans, amely 0x00000003 típusúként van definiálva.
